titles.title: End Employer Collusion Act
End Employer Collusion Act
To prohibit agreements between employers that directly restrict the current or future employment of any employee.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
